title: Plan a Bus Detour for a Parade
description: A city has announced a parade that will close several streets. A transit planner must create a detour for an affected bus route.

tasks.description: Identify all bus routes that pass through the parade area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that Route 12 is affected.

tasks.description: Using a map interface, plot a detour route for Route 12 that bypasses the street closures.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new, temporary route path is drawn.

tasks.description: Create temporary virtual bus stops along the detour route.
tasks.expected_outcome: New stops are added for the duration of the detour.

tasks.description: Publish the detour information, which updates schedules and sends alerts to subscribed riders.
tasks.expected_outcome: The detour is activated for the specified date and time, and the public is notified.
